2.rel: Translated by Joshua Galimogle, Laban Eysinkele & Joshua Borano

4.rel: Wohoo kaldaye saggi Faayrashi Koroona itaa’ho at abatti on jira

13.rel: Foga ileero: Mitta lamma hanjuf a kaalaabta.

17.rel: ’Deerka chirri at etoo yarho, attissiyo ommos khannan agarte waha yeel:

18.rel: Dafarti fool lakorsati sii: Intaas a kayarheene ommo a kaattissiyeen, uus ’doo’di isoodow khabsiin

22.rel: Kolossoo ma khannane sugeer on iskajeyissa.

23.rel: Enenyet a geeddi us khannanyahe i’daasenyi wihi tuso liiargine us enenyet khabsiicho.

24.rel: Ururre goya iiran a mehe eti khannan ma garatti.

38.rel: I’daasenyi hanjufti eti khannan ilassa a kidihta…..

39.rel: Atin tuumman a geeddi atin khannattaan

42.rel: Chirri at wahanyeyyoha baabul ’daarte at toro foolaah ’daarte

43.rel: Ichoow jiti kaldaye at holisso a chirri at saabbuun, ildawa ommos farso kadikhto.

44.rel: Faayras a geeddi us saha’dohoo meel kijiro

47.rel: A haaggantahe chirri at waansiha raahto

51.rel: Foolaah ommos fooli etoo a’daarin. Geeddi at i’daarin dahanohaah koloo saabbuun kadikh

52.rel: Geedda at dikhatti  geeyoo gaaban kol lamma dowo

61.rel: Wihi sugeer keeno dafartaas fool goya kasoobahaan cha’at geeddi deer gessatte

62.rel: Dafarti fool chi’iche geeddoo fiddiite rog. Maalinkoo kalday akutin.

69.rel: Dikkil fool ma ka’daarto koloo kalday laka.

70.rel: Afaf dikkil ommos barbar kafure ommos kahid dahano birriche mee.

81.rel: “This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel” by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)

82.rel: “The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe”, by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign policy, Report.  (Jan 25, 2020)

83.rel: “How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands”. By Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, opinion.  (Jan 28,2020)

85.rel:
Additional notes: Hygiene precautions in comic are effective in preventing many other common infections such as flu and cold, and should be applied in every day life, even when there is no epidemic. 
References: lnformation in comic is based on understanding of COVID19 up till 28 Feb 2020, and mainly from these three references.  https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/opinion/coronavirus-prevention-tips.htmlhttps://foreignpolicy.com/2020/01/25/wuhan-coronavirus-safety-china/  https://www.businessinsider.com/how-far-sneeze-cough-germs-can-travel-2018-10
Additonal lnformation A PDF version of the comic is available for free download here: https://gumroad.com/weimankowart 
Sharing Guidelines This comic is free for the general public to share online and through Whatsapp and Telegram, and the downloads are free for printing out as posters for personal and educational use in homes, schools, and workplaces. 
When sharing, please remember these 3 points: 1) No edits to the comics is allowed in any way when sharing. 2) Comics cannot be used for any commercial project 3) lf online, credit the creator on FB by tagging @weimankowart, on IG by tagging @weimankow (IG), or providing a link to instagram com/weimankow
For all other uses, please send a request in to: comicsforgood@gmail.com

bookText.rel:
Wori Faayrashi Koroona miinsan

Translated by Joshua Galimogle, Laban Eysinkele & Joshua Borano

Wohoo kaldaye saggi Faayrashi Koroona itaa’ho at abatti on jira
Saggi us itaaho’
Af
Sam
Indo
Miilassaah
Eti feyyan
Eti khannan
Faayras chirri  hanjufti
Foga ileero: Mitta lamma hanjuf a kaalaabta.
Koow
Mitta lamma
Attissiyo
’Deerka chirri at etoo yarho, attissiyo ommos khannan agarte waha yeel:
Dafarti fool lakorsati sii: Intaas a kayarheene ommo a kaattissiyeen, uus ’doo’di isoodow khabsiin
Lamma
Dafarti lakaneebsati
Ommos
Kolossoo ma khannane sugeer on iskajeyissa.
Enenyet a geeddi us khannanyahe i’daasenyi wihi tuso liiargine us enenyet khabsiicho.
Ururre goya iiran a mehe eti khannan ma garatti.
Kho’doomme
Eti feyyan
Saabab
Meelassi lafuro
Khadaabbe
Kokkoobbe
Bir
Darfohi fool lakorsati kharicho laka
Faaneyohi lakakoro
Ulaa’du
Kalaamoyyo
Afassi minanoot
Dahano
I’daasenyi hanjufti eti khannan ilassa a kidihta…..
Atin tuumman a geeddi atin khannattaan
Ommos fooli etaahkoo ’daarte
Indo isrobto
Chirri at wahanyeyyoha baabul ’daarte at toro foolaah ’daarte
Ichoow jiti kaldaye at holisso a chirri at saabbuun, ildawa ommos farso kadikhto.
Faayras a geeddi us saha’dohoo meel kijiro
Saabbuun
Waansi
A haaggantahe chirri at waansiha raahto
Miilassa saabbuun kadikh
Saabbuun
Dikkil
Foolaah ommos fooli etoo a’daarin. Geeddi at i’daarin dahanohaah koloo saabbuun kadikh
Geedda at dikhatti  geeyoo gaaban kol lamma dowo
Goffanne ilichooda
Geeddoo dikh
Farro dahchooda
Dahanohaah adahcho dikh
Weyti a mehe?
Cha’at ’daarte awa’waa’din. Dahano saabbuun kadikho.
Toro dafartaas fool khariche a’daarin.
hanjuf
Wihi sugeer keeno dafartaas fool goya kasoobahaan cha’at geeddi deer gessatte
Dafarti fool chi’iche geeddoo fiddiite rog. Maalinkoo kalday akutin.
Kucchugati golol lakagessati khab
Weel
Ooyo
Abar
Ebba dafartiis a khabo
Golol, karmo, kokkoobbe. Darfo isleegismina
Dikkil fool ma ka’daarto koloo kalday laka.
Afaf dikkil ommos barbar kafure ommos kahid dahano birriche mee.
Goob
Ichoow cha’at urur goya katimiy
Geeddi at igolossan
Kol dakkhan dahanohaah saabbuun kadikh
Wihi ’da’ddaboot
saabbuun
Mujjum fiddiiy, enenyet tuumman
Mujjum fiddiiy, enenyet tuumman
saabbuun
Worassaas mujjum soom
“This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel” by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)
“The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe”, by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign policy, Report.  (Jan 25, 2020)
“How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands”. By Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, opinion.  (Jan 28,2020)
Meelassi wora feyyaat lakeelo
Additional notes: Hygiene precautions in comic are effective in preventing many other common infections such as flu and cold, and should be applied in every day life, even when there is no epidemic. 
References: lnformation in comic is based on understanding of COVID19 up till 28 Feb 2020, and mainly from these three references.  https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/opinion/coronavirus-prevention-tips.htmlhttps://foreignpolicy.com/2020/01/25/wuhan-coronavirus-safety-china/  https://www.businessinsider.com/how-far-sneeze-cough-germs-can-travel-2018-10
Additonal lnformation A PDF version of the comic is available for free download here: https://gumroad.com/weimankowart 
Sharing Guidelines This comic is free for the general public to share online and through Whatsapp and Telegram, and the downloads are free for printing out as posters for personal and educational use in homes, schools, and workplaces. 
When sharing, please remember these 3 points: 1) No edits to the comics is allowed in any way when sharing. 2) Comics cannot be used for any commercial project 3) lf online, credit the creator on FB by tagging @weimankowart, on IG by tagging @weimankow (IG), or providing a link to instagram com/weimankow
